summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StreamVault M3U8 playlist manager. Backend APIs working well (12/13 tests passed). Frontend loads correctly with dark theme. Found issues with admin dashboard access and user session persistence.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Cosmetic - both indicate unauthorized access correctly

ui_bugs.issue: First user registration redirects to homepage instead of admin dashboard
User session not persisting across page reloads/navigation

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access admin dashboard even with admin privileges

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin dashboard routing issue - first user should be redirected to /admin after registration and admin dashboard should be accessible. Also fix user session persistence across page navigation.
